themes.description: This theme covers feedback related to the availability, functionality, and enhancement requests for trading-specific features.
This theme covers issues where account balances are incorrect, funds are missing, or unauthorized deductions occur, leading to concerns about fraud or scam.
Issues related to data privacy, account security, unauthorized access, or potential fraudulent activities.
This theme covers issues related to the accuracy and security of account balances, unauthorized deductions, or suspected fraudulent activities within the account.
Problems related to account activation, deactivation, or general account status and access.
Complaints about missing features, poor design, or inadequate functionality of core app features like charts, indicators, or specific trading tools.
Issues with adding, updating, or managing linked bank accounts for deposits and withdrawals.
Requests or feedback related to specific investment tools, options, or functionalities within the app, such as mutual fund payment frequencies or STP.
This theme covers problems related to applying for financial products like IPOs, mutual funds, or other investment opportunities, including issues with application processing or allotment.
This theme covers issues related to the results of investment applications, such as IPO allotments, fund performance, or investment returns.
This theme covers issues related to account opening, activation, verification, closure, or general management of user accounts.
